experiences: Led the analysis, design, implementation, and testing of the eligibility system under Agile methodologies, improving public access to services for multiple state agencies.
Designed and maintained schemas for Oracle Database. Optimized Oracle database queries using JPA and Hibernate, achieving 99.5% data accuracy and 25% faster retrieval.

Dockerized stand-alone recommendation system, deployed it into EKS and achieved a 30% reduction in response times and a 20% improvement in resource utilization through horizontal autoscaling and performance optimization.
